comments_since_last_sample.body: Rocked the original back in 1996! Now I've moved on to Aqua di gio purfumo and Profondo!
Never wear that,im really new in frag game,i hope i can get that someday🙏🏽
Believe it or not, have only ever smelled the flankers from the ADG line! Would love to give myself a history lesson and check out the original!👌🏻
Man, I used to shower with ADG and hit salsa parties from 2010 to 2015, huge success with the ladies!!! Then I discovered AVENTUS 😏😏😏
I would like to be entered. Actually, I've never smelled the original ADG, but I love Profondo, so it would be nice to wint that bottle and give the OG a try.
I have never worn Aqua Di Gio, but I own Perry Ellis Red and I love Profomo.  So I'm crazy for that DNA and look forward to a possible addition to that collection.
I will definitely check Artisan Pure and Chrome Aqua. Need some freshies for my cold season rotation. Thanks for the awesome review Ash!
I would like to be entered. I have actually never owned the original
I’ve never rocked Acqua Di Gio the original. I only have Profumo in the line. But it would always be great to have another dumb reach in the collection
I have never owned the OG AdG, but I have Profumo and Profondo. I have always wanted to add this to the collection.
